title: U.S. hiring speeds up, wages spurt higher
text:
U.S. hiring speeds up, wages spurt higher 10:20am EST - 01:15 
U.S. employers added 200,000 workers to their payrolls in January, and wages grew at their fastest pace in nearly 9 years. But as Fred Katayama reports, Wall Street saw that good news as bad news. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
U.S. employers added 200,000 workers to their payrolls in January, and wages grew at their fastest pace in nearly 9 years. But as Fred Katayama reports, Wall Street saw that good news as bad news.
